data.title: Zszywka
data.description: Zszywka is a graphic social network, where you can find an inspiring image on any topic, meet new people, promote own products. Zszywka allows to store all images one place, create shared publics and share an inspiration with other users.
data.techs: PHP5, MySQL, Smarty, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery

data.title: Flex-mix
data.description: Flex-mix has all needed functionality for building web application from scratch. It is my own solution for front-end development. It`s sass based boilerplate with grid system that based on flex technology. Sass structure is based on 7-1 architecture pattern(https://github.com/HugoGiraudel/sass-boilerplate). Responsive grid is based on Flexbox Grid(http://flexboxgrid.com/). Automation tools: Gulp. Other libraries: jQuery 2.2.3, Wow.js, modernizr.
data.techs: PHP5, MySQL, Smarty, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery

data.title: Tapon - Facebook Application
data.techs: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Facebook Development Tools

data.title: Zajazd Folklor
data.description: Website for hotel Zajazd Folklor. Information and photos about all the services provided by the hotel, apartment reservation

primaris.title: Primaris
primaris.responsibilities: Designing, developing front-end of web applications. Creating front-end for mobile devices(and mobile first approach, of course). Creating and developing components for huge CMS of insurance company. Improving web applications based on PHP

profit_network.title: Profit Network
profit_network.responsibilities: Development of administration panel for web application Tapon.pl based on commercial PHP Framework. Designing and development of database, server and client side for commercial squash league. Development of single page web applications based on commercial PHP Framework on server side and Bootstrap 3 on client side. Development of front-end for Tapon.pl facebook application.

szafa_pl.title: Szafa.pl
szafa_pl.responsibilities: Development of administration panel tools for viewing statistics reports, complaints from users. Creation of functionality "promo pin", which allows users to keep their content in the top of content category.Creation of public(shared group). This is a group, that has few owners and many members. There users can send invitation to each other and share their content. Implementation of new graphical components in Zszywka.pl design (buttons, labels, fonts, logos, etc.).

ideo.title: Ideo
ideo.responsibilities: My first job in field of Web Development. Making a front-end templates for internal commercial CMS system. Converting PSD templates to the HTML and CSS.
